channel.title: Project RsmScape - Team needed
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/6490/projectrsmhh1.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/4407/whatuppp3.png[/img][/center]
http://projectrsm.darkbb.com/ - Forums
Updates to server/client: 1.) Added several commands 2.) Added Global Objects (tut from sythe) 3.) Added ancients tab next to friends list 4.) Created a "Project Rsm CLIENT!" 5.) Fixed some skillcapes on server, still need to fix more. 6.) Added "Money Shield", Still needs fixing 7.) Found a "Dragon Platebody" in client (?), will fix soon. 8.) Updated some "models". And walla, Attack Masters appeared!.
Hey whats up. New project coming out hopefully. Starting from testscape source. Started already. Need a team that will be devoted to doing there job. Anybody that signs up and gets the position must be able to do the required job or will be kicked off team. Each player will reserve either a "mod" or a "admin" spot on the final server, and will be thanked when released. Here are some pictures of the client!
[img]http://img182.imageshack.us/img182/4770/rsm1ki9.png[/img] [img]http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/6797/rsm2pt0.png[/img]
I have coded servers before. Although I am pretty good at coding, I will still need help in MANY areas. Below are the jobs open for now:
Coders: 1.) Purespwnage 2.) panthers_08 3.) 4.) 5.)
Hosters: 1.) 2.)
Forum Mods: 1.) I D D S I 2.) a5390 3.) chumbo
Client Dev Team: 1.) 2.) 3.)
Server/Client Tester: 1.) I D D S I 2.) a5390
More positions available shortly.
I am hoping to have the server run off either the "silabsoft" client or a client that part of the team can help design. I am looking for team members that can be DEVOTED to designing this server.
Required for positions:
[b][u]Coders:[/u][/b] 1.)Must be able to do the assigned job at hand. With each job done, the coder must write a ".txt" file of where to put the coding written and what it will do. Coders will be rewarded with an "admin" spot on the final server.
[b][u]Hosters:[/u][/b] Hosters MUST be able to have the server up at least 12 hours a day. (After release). Hosters must have there own no-ip.com username and password.
[b][u]Forum Mods:[/u][/b] Forum Mods must be fair and be able to post fairly often.
No more for now.
Here is application form.
[code] Username: E-mail: AIM/MSN: Position Desired: Will you be a dedicated member?: [/code]
Thanks a bunch![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2008, 09:25:01 PM[/size][hr]Still looking for team!

item.title: Project RsmScape - Team needed
item.dc:creator: @mage_burst mage_burst
item.description:
@mage_burst wrote:

(1).Username:Kory05069

(2).E-mail:Kory05069@yahoo.com

(3).AIM/MSN: (MSN) Raith77@hotmail.com

(4).Position Desired:Well I Can Do Some Basic Coding, And Im Good With Folowing Directions Aswell As Giving A Good Statement As A Answer. So A Fourm Mod Or A Basic Coder.

(5).Will you be a dedicated member?: I Will Spend As Much Time As I Can Possibly Have In My Spare Time When I Am Not Busy To Play/Help As Many People As I Can A Day, I Can Assure You I Can Be On More Then Once A Day, And More Then 3 Hours A Day Or More.

Read full topic

and i am available almost 24/7 so hopefully i can be your coder

item.dc:creator: @panthers_08 panthers_08

item.title: Project RsmScape - Team needed
item.dc:creator: @purespwnage purespwnage
item.description:
@purespwnage wrote:

[center][/center]
[center][/center]

http://projectrsm.darkbb.com/ - Forums

Updates to server/client:
1.) Added several commands
2.) Added Global Objects (tut from sythe)
3.) Added ancients tab next to friends list
4.) Created a “Project Rsm CLIENT!”
5.) Fixed some skillcapes on server, still need to fix more.
6.) Added “Money Shield”, Still needs fixing
7.) Found a “Dragon Platebody” in client (?), will fix soon.
8.) Updated some “models”. And walla, Attack Masters appeared!.
